issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The title, description and picture [params|http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/api/ShareDialogParams] are [no longer supported by FB|https://developers.facebook.com/docs/sharing/reference/share-dialog] and should be removed from our module and API reference.

Found by SO user:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/35868729/facebook-module-share-issue
fields.summary: Facebook: *shareDialog should no longer include title, picture and description params

comments.body: We use {{title}}, {{description}} and {{picture}} in the SDK. The link provided is for the Web-SDK, the native ones are still cool with it. Closing.
